scoringPlays.text: Amari Rodgers 40 Yd pass from Kelly Bryant (Greg Huegel Kick)
Diondre Overton 6 Yd pass from Trevor Lawrence (Greg Huegel Kick)
Travis Etienne 7 Yd Run (Greg Huegel Kick)
Kelly Bryant 35 Yd Run (Greg Huegel Kick)
Justyn Ross 15 Yd pass from Trevor Lawrence (Greg Huegel Kick)
Braden Galloway 9 Yd pass from Trevor Lawrence (Alex Spence Kick)
Ryan DeLuca 16 Yd pass from Darren Grainger (Grayson Atkins Kick)

videos.headline: Bryant throws 40-yard TD to open Clemson scoring
videos.description: Clemson QB Kelly Bryant throws a perfect pass to WR Amari Rodgers for Clemson's first touchdown of the season.

videos.headline: Lawrence shows off accuracy with throw to Thompson
videos.description: In his first collegiate quarter of football, Clemson QB Trevor Lawrence shows his ability to pass the football down the field with a long throw to Trevion Thompson.

videos.headline: Lawrence throws first collegiate TD
videos.description: Clemson QB Trevor Lawrence throws his first collegiate touchdown with a 6-yard pass to Diondre Overton

videos.headline: Clemson puts another TD on Furman
videos.description: Travis Etienne runs eight yards untouched for Clemson's third touchdown of the half.

videos.headline: Bryant runs 35 yards for the TD
videos.description: Kelly Bryant takes the ball himself for a 35-yard Clemson touchdown

videos.headline: Lawrence throws second TD of game
videos.description: Clemson freshman Trevor Lawrence throws a 15-yard TD to fellow freshman Justin Ross late in the third quarter.

videos.headline: Lawrence throws third TD of the game
videos.description: Trevor Lawrence throws an 8-yard touchdown pass to Braden Galloway for Lawrence's third touchdown of the game.
